member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_PARA
member.summary: The CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_PARA structure defines additional parameters for the time stamp request.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_PARA.pszTSAPolicyId
member.summary: Optional. A pointer to a null-terminated character string that contains the Time Stamping Authority (TSA) policy under which the time stamp token should be provided.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_PARA.fRequestCerts
member.summary: A Boolean value that specifies whether the TSA must include the certificates used to sign the time stamp token in the response .

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_PARA.Nonce
member.summary: Optional. A CRYPT_INTEGER_BLOB structure that contains the nonce value used by the client to verify the timeliness of the response when no local clock is available.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_PARA.cExtension
member.summary: The number of elements in the array pointed to by the rgExtension member.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_PARA.rgExtension
member.summary: A pointer to an array of structures that contain extension information that is passed in the request.
